title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 10

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let's start by forming a nested radical expession for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"|x|"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":":
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
|x| = \sqrt{x^2}\\
|x| = \sqrt{1+(x-1)\sqrt{1+x(x+2)}}\\
|x| = \sqrt{1+(x-1)\sqrt{1+x\sqrt{1+(x+1)(x+3)}}}\\
\vdots \\
|x| = \sqrt{1+(x-1)\sqrt{1+x\sqrt{1+(x+1)\sqrt{1+(x+2)\sqrt{\cdots}}}}}
"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Simply putting "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" gives us:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{2017=\sqrt{1+2016\sqrt{1+2017\sqrt{1+2018\sqrt{1+2019\sqrt{\cdots}}}}}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ramanujan's nested radical formula (equation 21)","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" is as follows:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\small x+n+a = \sqrt{ax+(n+a)^2+x\sqrt{a(x+n)+(n+a)^2+(x+n)\sqrt{a(x+2n)+(n+a)^2+(x+2n)\sqrt{...}}}} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Substitute "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = 2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016+1+0 = \sqrt{1+2016\sqrt{1+2017\sqrt{1+2018\sqrt{1+2019\sqrt{1+...}}}}} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S = \boxed{2017}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 11
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Mary starts with one standard die on a table."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At each step, she rolls all the dice on the table: if all of them show a 6 on top, then she places one more die on the table; otherwise, she does nothing more on this step."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the number of dice on the table after 2016 such steps."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the expected value (average value) of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6^D"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"? "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":3}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a part of the Set."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For every nonnegative integer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the number of dice on the table after "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" steps."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At the start, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_0 = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we are told that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_{n +1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_n + 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with probability "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6^{-D_n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" otherwise."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence the expected value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6^{D_{n +1}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", given "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", is"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E(6^{D_{n +1}}\mid D_n) = 6^{-D_n}. 6^{D_n +1}+(1 - 6^{-D_n}).6^{D_n} = 6^{D_n} + 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Averaging over "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D_n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" shows that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E(6^{D_{n +1}}) = E(E(6^{D_{n +1}}\mid D_n)) = E(6^{D_n} + 5) = E(6^{D_n}) + 5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Each expected value is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" more than the previous one, so we have:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E(6^{D_{2016}}) = E(6^{D_0}) + 2016. 5 = E(6^1) + 10080 = 6 + 10080 = \boxed{10086}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Ah, nice application of the "},{"type":"text","text":"Law of Iterated Expectation","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":".

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P_{n,d}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" the probability of having "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 \leq d \leq n+1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", dices at step "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It follows that"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \displaystyle P_{n,d}=\begin{cases}  P_{n-1,d}\cdot \frac{6^d-1}{6^d}+P_{n-1,d-1}\cdot \frac{1}{6^{d-1}}, & \mbox{for} \ 1 \leq d \leq n \\ \frac{1}{6^{n(n+1)/2}}, & \mbox{for} \ d=n+1 \end{cases} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So, the expected value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6^d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" after "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" steps is"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle E_n=\sum_{d=1}^{n+1} 6^d P_{n,d} = \sum_{d=1}^{n} 6^d P_{n,d} + \frac{6^{n+1}}{6^{n(n+1)/2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If we expand the last sum and substitute "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P_{n,d}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we get"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \sum_{d=1}^{n} 6^d P_{n,d}=\sum_{d=1}^{n}\bigg[ P_{n-1,d}\cdot (6^d-1)+6P_{n-1,d-1}\bigg]=\sum_{d=1}^{n} 6^d P_{n-1,d}-\sum_{d=1}^{n} P_{n-1,d} + 6\sum_{d=1}^{n} P_{n-1,d-1}=E_{n-1}-1+6\bigg(1-\frac{1}{6^{(n-1)n/2}}\bigg)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle E_n=E_{n-1}+5-\frac{6}{6^{n(n-1)/2}}+\frac{6^{n+1}}{6^{n(n+1)/2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"E_0=6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", solving the recurrence we get "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle E_n=5n+6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Eventually"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle E_{2016}=5\cdot 2016+6=\boxed{10086}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 12

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I assumed that since n was the largest positive integer, it would be greater than 2016."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2016}+2^{6012}+2^n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"     can be written as   "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2016}.(2^{n-2016} + 2^{3996}+1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is already a square number, so for the second bracket we can use the following expansion:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" (2^{m}+1)^{2}= 2^{2m}+2^{m}+1 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2m=n-2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+1=3996"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since doing the other substitution, i.e: "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2m=3996"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+1=n-2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"yields a smaller n, i.e: n= 4015."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore,On solving n comes out as 10006"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We can rewrite the equation as the following:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(2^{1008}+2^{3006})^2=2^{2016}+2^{3006}+2^n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in which case "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=4015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Or another possibility is:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(2^{1008}+2^{\frac{n}{2}})^2=2^{2016}+2^{6012}+2^{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  In  this  case, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=10006"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clearly the second case yields a way larger value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Compare the given expression to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large (2^m)^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" +"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large (2^p)^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large 2(2^m)(2^p)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large (2^m + 2^p)^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large 2p = n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  Two cases arise, one when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large (2^{6012})"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large 2(2^m)(2^n)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" term and second when its a squared term."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You shall notice that the former case gives a larger value for n."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 13

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+y+z =6000 "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
X+Y+Z=48 ( taking X as 2016- x same has been done for y and z ) "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Which gives u 50c2 =1225 "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Now cases where X and Yare same "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
2X + Z  =48 ( 25 cases where Z is an even no till 48) "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
( similarly we have 2 more cases when X and Z are equal and when Y and Z are equal)                       "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Also the case where all X,Y,Z are same (16 each, but this case has been counted 3 times so we need to balance hence "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
1225-25*3 +2 = 1152 "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
In this all 3 are unequal and one sixth of the cases will give u when. X< Y<Z will happen                 "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence 1152/6= 192 "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Hence the solutiom"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 14
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(a, b) =\dfrac{1}{a+b}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b \ne 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Suppose that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x, y, z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are distinct integers such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+y +z = 2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(f(x, y), z) = f(x, f(y, z))"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (where both sides of the equation exist and are welldefined)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Compute "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":3}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a part of the Set."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(f(x, y), z) = f(x, f(y, z))"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we have that:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{1}{\dfrac{1}{x+y} + z}=\dfrac{1}{x +\dfrac{1}{y+z}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Simplifying, we have that"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x +\dfrac{1}{y+z}=\dfrac{1}{x+y} + z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x(y + z)(x + y) + (x + y) = (y + z) + z(x + y)(y + z)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x ((y + z)(x + y) + 1) = z ((x + y)(y + z) + 1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x - z) ((y + z)(x + y) + 1) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are distinct, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x - z \ne 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so we may divide through by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x - z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to obtain"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(y + z)(x + y) + 1 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(y + z)(x + y) = -1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x + y + z = 2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y + z = 2016 - x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x + y = 2016 - z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(2016 - x)(2016 - z) = -1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x, y, z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are integers, we have that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x = 2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"z = 2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (or the other way around)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"In either case, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y = 2016 - x - z = 2016 - 2015 - 2017 = \boxed{-2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 15
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x) = x^3 + ax^2 + bx + c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"g(x) = x^3 + bx^2 + cx + a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a, b, c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are integers with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c \ne 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Suppose that the following conditions hold:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(1) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the roots of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"g(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are squares of the roots of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S=a^{2016}+b^{2016}+ c^{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":3}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a part of the Set."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"g(1) = f(1) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a root of both "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"g(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"q"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the other two roots of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"q^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are the other two roots of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"g(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We then get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"pq = -c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p^2q^2 = -a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a = -c^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Also, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(-a)^2= (p+q + 1)^2 = p^2 +q^2 + 1 + 2(pq +p+q) = -b+ 2b = b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b = c^4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(1) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we therefore get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 + c - c^2 + c^4 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Factorising, we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(c + 1)(c^3 - c^2 + 1) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c^3 - c^2 + 1 = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has no integer root and hence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = -1, b = 1, a = -1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S=a^{2016} + b^{2016} + c^{2016} = \boxed{3}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Though "},{"type":"text","text":"Khang Nguyen Thanh's","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]},{"type":"text","text":" solution is the best,here is another approach which is a little "},{"type":"text","text":"TROLL","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" and objective."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We know that any integer to the power 2016 is always positive."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If any of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a,b,c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is either  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\le-2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\ge2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a^{2016}+b^{2016}+c^{2016}=2^{2016} + something  positive"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since such an huge answer cannot be entered in Brilliant answer box,we now have to check for the values "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0,1,-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". But since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c\ne0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c^{2016}=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence this rules out "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as an answer.Now the answers can only be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1,2,3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which can be easily done since we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" tries."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus when you enter "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as your answer,you get "},{"type":"text","text":"CORRECT","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2016 is absolutely awesome 16
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^{2016}+cx^{2015}+\binom{c}{2}x^{2014}+\binom{c}{3}x^{2013}+\cdots+\binom{c}{2016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many real numbers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are there such that the above polynomial has 2016 real roots (counting multiplicities)?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Details and Assumptions","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We define the generalized binomial coefficient as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle\binom{c}{k}=\dfrac{c(c-1)(c-2)\cdots(c-k+1)}{k!}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If there are infinite real numbers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfied, submit "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as the answer. "}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":3}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a part of the Set."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c = 2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" 
The equation could be written as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x^{2016-c})(x+1)^{c}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" . 0 has multiplicity "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016 - c "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has multiplicity "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
SO there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
Now if c be a integer greater than 2016 . Then the equation would be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x+1)^{2016} + \binom{c}{n} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which is bound to have some complex roots.
Now if c be a negative integer then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\binom{c}{n}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is undefined . Also this is the case for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" being a real number other than integers.
Now I do not have proofs for the last two arguments that I made. But I can only assume that the factorial notation was not extended to reals other than natural numbers ."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many functions "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f:\mathbb{N}\rightarrow\mathbb{N}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(20160) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"for all "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(xy) = f(x)f(y)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"for any "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" whose last digit is 3, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(n) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Classification:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\mathbb{N}=\{0; 1; 2; 3; \ldots\}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":3}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is a part of the Set."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f^6(2)f^2(3)f(5)f(7) = f(20160) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we must have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(2) = f(3) = f(5) =f(7) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(2) = f(2\times 1) = f(2)f(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we also have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(1) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a positive integer that is not a multiple of 2 or 5 then for some "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"nm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has last digit 3."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(n)f(m) = f(nm) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and hence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(n) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n = 2^a5^bn_0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n_0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is not a multiple of 2 or 5 then"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(n) = f^a(2)f^b(5)f(n_0) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(n)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must equal "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for all non-zero "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Finally note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(0) = f(0)f(0)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(0) = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(0) = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So, there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" functions such that all of above conditions."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many pairs of positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(a, b)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1\le a, b\le 2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for which every root of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(f(x)) - x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer?
